title: Tushar Atre murder: Surveillance video captures the brutal kidnapping of a tech executive — but what happened off camera? - CBS News
content:
1. Tushar Atre murder: Surveillance video captures the brutal kidnapping of a tech executive — but what happened off camera?  CBS News
  2. Tech executive kidnapped and murdered  48 Hours
  3. Who wanted to kill Tushar Atre?  48 Hours
  4. "48 Hours" investigates the kidnapping and murder of a California entrepreneur  CBS Mornings
  5. Tushar Atre death: Did pushups and disrespect lead to murder?  CBS News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: After neighborhood security cameras show Tushar Atre fighting for his life during a vicious attack near his Santa Cruz, California, home, he is later found shot to death at his cannabis farm 14 miles away.
